Compatible with iOS 9.2 and till 11.3.1.

LazyCursor Gives the Opportunity to Remove the Blink of the Cursors (the Animation of the Carets in the Text Typing) & to Hide the Cursors on System Wide!

More to Come in the Next Updates! (i.e. Cursor Colors Customization).

See Screenshots below.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak! (Changes are instantaneous, just in Case kill the Target Application from the Switcher and open it again to Refresh Prefs).

Configure options from Settings.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Version 1.0.1
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).
